txt.en: 'Oh, these lilies are beautiful. Thank you. Perhaps such a request seemed silly in the face of everything that is happening... but I am grateful that you went out of your way to help me.'

'If you are able, [placeholder], would you help me gather lilies from the marsh north of here? It has been a busy time for both my husband Rossaran and me, and I wish to surprise him with something nice. Of course, I will reward you for your efforts.'
You have collected plenty of lilies.\n\nYou should bring them to Bruidis in Tadrent.
Bruidis wishes to surprise her husband with a gift.
Bruidis has asked you to help her collect lilies from the marsh north of Tadrent.
